metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare DNS | Authoritative and Secondary DNS
metaTags.metaDescription: With Cloudflare DNS you have the fastest response time of any DNS provider. Our DNS has unparalleled redundancy and built-in security.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DNS
relatedBlades.subtitle: Enterprise-grade authoritative DNS with the fastest response time
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare DNS delivers secure and resilient DNS service with the fastest response time (11ms on average), unparalleled redundancy (locations in over %{DataCenterCount} cities), and advanced security.

contentfulAsset.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

columnContent.title: Industry-leading performance
columnContent.description: Our authoritative DNS is the fastest in the world, offering DNS lookup speeds of 11ms on average and ensuring websites load as fast as possible.

columnContent.title: Unmatched reliability
columnContent.description: Our global network offers optimal redundancy, with DNS resolution available at each of our data centers across over %{DataCenterCount} cities.

columnContent.title: Stop DNS-based attacks
columnContent.description: Cloudflare offers built-in DDoS protection and one-click DNSSEC to ensure your applications are always safeguarded from DNS attacks.

columnContent.title: DNS made easy
columnContent.description: All your domains can be managed through our user-friendly interface or via an API, without regard to where you host your Internet properties.

relatedBlades.title: Our global network ensures DNS resolves quickly
relatedBlades.copy:
The Cloudflare global network interconnects with over %{NetworkInterconnects} networks, ensuring users anywhere in the world can quickly load your websites and applications. 

Cloudflare DNS also comes with built-in security, mitigating DDoS attacks that can degrade response times and authenticating DNS responses with DNSSEC to ensure users are not misdirected to malicious websites.

relatedBlades.title: Learn how Cloudflare DNS can protect against cyber attacks

buttonOne.elementName: DNS Product Page -  ADDITIONAL OFFER BLADE - CTA

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Leader and Fast Mover in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for DNS Security
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader and Fast Mover in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for DNS Security report.

content.value: "Cloudflare has an incredibly large network and infrastructure to stop really large attacks on the DNS system. We just get clean requests and never have to deal with malicious traffic or attacks on the DNS infrastructure."

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DNS keeps your DNS secure and reliable, with simple-to-use advanced options for managing and securing your domains

columnContent.title: Unlimited and unmetered DDoS mitigation
columnContent.description: Stop attacks on your DNS by relying on our network, which has capacity %{NetworkCapacityLargestDDOS} higher than the largest attacks ever recorded.

columnContent.title: Prevent email phishing
columnContent.description: Easily configure email security DNS records to stop phishers from sending emails from your domain.

columnContent.title: Advanced DNS analytics
columnContent.description: Get in-depth, real-time analytics for the health of your DNS traffic, accessible from the Cloudflare Dashboard.

iconAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Web Analytics - APPROVED WEB ICONS

contentfulAsset.description: Cloudflare Web Analytics - APPROVED WEB ICONS

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide optimize and secure their applications

primaryCtaButton.elementName: DNS Product Page -  Case studies - CTA

relatedBlades.title: Upgrade your website security and performance with free DNS & so much more!

planFeatures.name: Role-based Account Control
planFeatures.description: Role-based access for Cloudflare accounts enables organizations to collaborate across one Cloudflare account, and use roles-based permissions to control access. Each user is assigned an individual API key and can use two-factor authentication to protect their own account.

planFeatures.name: Cloudflare Rules
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Rules allows you to make adjustments to requests and responses, configure Cloudflare settings, and trigger specific actions for matching requests. Examples of rule use cases include setting cache expirations, modifying security levels for sections of your site, and forwarding URLs.

features.title: Improving DNS security, performance, and reliability
features.description: Achieving robust site security, performance, and reliability requires integrated DNS security and a redundant DNS infrastructure that is optimized for performance.

imageAssetFile.altText: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image
imageAssetFile.title: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

features.title: DNS and the threat of DDoS
features.description: In recent years, attackers have been able to take down essential services and huge patches of the Internet using large distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks against DNS. Learn how Cloudflare uses its network architecture to mitigate these attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image
imageAssetFile.title: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

features.title: How DNSSEC works
features.description: The domain name system (DNS) is the phone book of the Internet: it tells computers where to send and retrieve information. Unfortunately, it also accepts any address given to it, no questions asked. The solution is a protocol called DNSSEC.

imageAssetFile.altText: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image
imageAssetFile.title: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image
